subject: Fix Presets/Pages/Content UI issues from user feedback
body:
- Remove confusing blue/green indicator dots from page thumbnails
- Fix PageStrip mobile wrapping (thumbnails wrap instead of squeeze)
- Fix markdown rendering: use whiteSpace normal instead of pre-wrap
- Make Auto alignment icon visually distinct from Center icon
- Move Sample Images from Media tab to Presets tab (start-here flow)
